text: Bhai working with you humanoid club me and mech me...bakchod experience tha. Still remember the nights jab uss robo ko walk krwana chah rhe the and it took 1 step! Ese hi chaapte rho.. Good luck for your life ahead!
author: Priyanshu  Saxena

text: Bro..aap ke liye to kya kahe. School time se bakaiti rhi h teri to. You're the most amazing, pure and sincere person I've ever seen and you'll be achieving great heights in your life. Har sport itna ache see kaise khel lete ho cricket, football, basketball, badminton, volleyball and many more... Apna to milna rhega aage bhi.. Good luck for your future endeavors!
author: Priyanshu  Saxena

text: You're a very calm, focused and fun person to be with... Thanks to you I passed MSO203 somehow! Good luck for your goals which you;'ll definitely achieve!
author: Priyanshu  Saxena

text: Bhai...some of my best memories are playing basketball with you and hall 2 ki mess seating planings! It was great to refresh some of those memories in the last month..Bhai lakdi ka board hota to pkka jati! XD
author: Priyanshu  Saxena

text: Bro.. tere perfect fake shots jo seedhe ujjwal ke hath me jate the...Respect! You're one of the most talented individuals I've come across. Will miss playing basketball with you. Keep on writing those amazing poems and songs!
author: Priyanshu  Saxena

text: Bhai Bhai Bhai.... tere sath to reso se hi bakchod mahol raha! Reso me jo padhai sath ki hai aur fir IITK me pehla zumba and treasure hunt! Mast h bhai tu ese hi reh.. Baki apna to milna bna rhega..
author: Priyanshu  Saxena

text: Be the lively, carefree soul you are! April me mauj kradi bhai!
author: Priyanshu  Saxena

text:
Well, my only regret with IITK would be not getting to know you sooner. You're this amazing, pure, quite adventurous (sneaky) and talented person. I'll cherish all the time I've spent with you that night in OAT or the walks in the academic area. You finally showed me the nursery on my last day! I'm looking forward to adventures that we plan together vaguely. Good luck for your future, you're hardworking, determined and chaapu...you'll do great!
Bet to me hi jeetunga XD
author: Priyanshu  Saxena

text: It was the messenger's fault!! I was asleep long ago...by mistake...I remembered!
author: Priyanshu  Saxena

text:
Bhai hope you're doing good!
Taekwondo me tumhare aur priank ke sahare hi saara time nikla h...although I didn't continue that journey till the end.. I'll miss those 1 ghante ke sessions jisme sir haste haste split maarne ko bolte the yha apni fat jati thi! Bohot mast and talented h bhai tu.. Wishing you good luck for your future!
I would love to relive these memories if our paths cross in future!
author: Priyanshu  Saxena

text: Yo Prateek! Bhai that TA lab jaha kya hi model bnaye the apn ne and itna free time tha ki braqzing se golden decoration krne ki soch rhe the! XD... YOu're extremely dedicated and humble individual...ese hi rehna and chaapte rho!
author: Priyanshu  Saxena

text:
Bhai....Taekwondo se Basketball se puri IITK journey! I remember being so relieved to see a familiar face in taekwondo jab basketball me nhi hua tha! Taekwondo bhi alag mauj tha bhai...and later we were the only non-cpa basketball players on the court...Bhai mast time tha vo bhi! Baad me yash ke room pe vibe thi and that blowback hit hard! All the time spent with you was so fun! 
Aise hi bakchod rho!
author: Priyanshu  Saxena
